parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description:
The ID of the file system.

*   The IDs of CPFS file systems must start with `cpfs-`. Example: cpfs-099394bd928c\*\*\*\*.
*   The IDs of CPFS for LINGJUN file systems must start with `bmcpfs-`. Example: bmcpfs-290w65p03ok64ya\*\*\*\*.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filter that is used to query filesets.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of results for each query.

Valid values: 10 to 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: OrderByField
parameters.description:
The condition by which the results are sorted. Valid values:

*   FileCountLimit: the file quantity quota
*   SizeLimit: the capacity quota
*   FileCountUsage: the usage of the file quantity quota
*   SpaceUsage: the capacity usage

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the results. Valid values:

*   asc (default): ascending order
*   desc: descending order

>  This parameter takes effect only if you specify the OrderByField parameter.
